Title: When the Game Stands Tall
Writer: Scott Marshall Smith (screenplay), Scott Marshall Smith (story), David Zelon (story), Neil Hayes (book)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Michael Chiklis, Alexander Ludwig, Clancy Brown
Plot: The journey of legendary football coach Bob Ladouceur, who took the De La Salle High School Spartans from obscurity to a 151-game winning streak that shattered all records for any American sport.
